name: smart-ass stinks
content: People say genius is 99% perspiration and 1% inspiration. Maybe that's why sometimes a smart-ass really stinks.

comments.comment: I used it at workplace, everyone was laughing. loved it!

not bad. I tried it at my class presentation by changing smart ass to engineer (nothing against engineer, just that the class topic is on engineering creaticity, so i wanted to crack some jokes), and everyone was enjoying it. most say it's witty. but some find it a bit rude, but acceptable. so i guess it depends on how you used and the audience's tolerance level. good one indeed.

name: Mr Sweet
content: Mr Sweet is a student at a programming bootcamp. He is a very considerate young chap. One day, one of his classmates went out to pack lunch. On her way back, it suddenly rained dogs and cats. Mr Sweet immediately called her to ask where she was, and brought one umbrella to fetch her. Even though there were 2 umbrellas in the room and he knew he needed 2 umbrellas, he decided to only bring 1, just in case someone else might need the other umbrella. So he was all drenched when he came back.

comments.comment: great story! will share at my seminar for kindness
